blocks.subject: FW: Access to the floor
text: I think that your badge has  not been activated
for the access to the floor after 7 p.m. or the weekends.
We shall take care of it.

raw_header: ---------------------- Forwarded by Vince J Kaminski/HOU/ECT on 03/06/2001

blocks.subject: FW: Access to the floor
raw_header: Subject: FW: Access to the floor

blocks.subject: Access to the floor
text: Last nite after using the gym I tried to return to my cubicle to pick up
I was unable to get onto our floor.
Is there a time-sensitive access for my badge?
If so, can this be remedied.  I will be using the gym most nites and
don't want to have to bring my gym bag home each nite.
